channel.title: Need help! with 2handed weapons in client.java
channel.description: im trying to find 2handed in client.java but i cant find it can somone help me? post here or message me trying to get god swords 2 handed for ma server

item.title: Need help! with 2handed weapons in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Still wrong lol.

Here’s what you need:

  public boolean item2handed(int ID) {
        for(int i = 0; i < more2handed.length; i++)
        {
            if(more2handed[i] == ID) return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

But if I were you I would add them properly instead of creating 2 arrays.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! with 2handed weapons in client.java
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

public boolean item2handed(int ID) {
if (ID == more2handed.length) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! with 2handed weapons in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

public boolean item2handed(int ID) { if (ID == 1) { return true; } else { return false; }

Will just return true if the ID is 1, so that wouldn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! with 2handed weapons in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Ixy Ixy
item.description:
@Ixy wrote:

/* ADD MORE TWO HANDED ITEMS HERE */

public static int more2handed[] = { 7158, 1319, 6528, 14915};

public static int more2handed() {
    return more2handed[more2handed.length];
}

public boolean item2handed(int ID) {
    if (ID == 1) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 18, 2008, 06:31:19 AM[/size][hr] if (targetSlot == playerWeapon && wearID >= 0) {
SendWeapon(wearID, GetItemName(wearID));
playerSE = GetStandAnim(wearID);
playerSEW = GetWalkAnim(wearID);
playerSER = GetRunAnim(wearID);
playerSEA = 0x326;
if (item2handed(wearID) == true) {
playerSE = 0x811;
playerSEW = 0x67F;
playerSER = 0x680;
}
